title: Michael Schur | Republicans Feign Outrage Over Biden's "Stupid Son of a Bitch" Comment: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump supporters pretending to be outraged over a hot mic moment in which President Biden insulted a Fox News reporter.

Then, Michael Schur talks about the inspiration behind his book How to Be Perfect, how The Good Place writing crew helped with writing it and playing Mose on The Office.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
